alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 20 at 2:24AM CST until December 23 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, accumulating snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph with widespread blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Ellis County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Watch, from late Wednesday night through Friday morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
